keyword: how many calories is in a sausage egg mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a sausage egg mcmuffin from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg; includes English muffin, pork sausage patty, egg, cheese; standard preparation without modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage Egg McMuffin contains about 480 calories, with 17 g protein and 31 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 calories per standard Sausage Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 17 g of protein from the egg, sausage, and cheese.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Around 830 mg, mostly from the sausage and muffin.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, about 30 g total carbs, with 2 g fiber from the English muffin.

faqs.q: How does the Sausage Egg McMuffin compare to the Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: The sausage version adds ~200 calories and more fat compared to the plain Egg McMuffin at ~300 calories.
